{"title": "X-Scape", "title_search": "xscape", "title_keyword": "xscape", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/x-scape/", "summary": "[DSiWare]  Your journey through the universe of X-Scape begins as you wake from 10 years of cryosleep, only to find yourself unexpectedly thrown into a fearsome battle against an evil empire bent on your destruction.
